Lotas is building Erdos: a secure, AI-native IDE for data science. Cursor is excellent for software development but it lacks data science-specific tools that are critical to a data scientist’s workflow. Lotas is closing that gap.

For our first product, we built Rao: an AI coding assistant into RStudio — an IDE used by up to 5 million data scientists and statisticians who use the R programming language to analyze data. Rao could read, write, and edit code while understanding the user's context (codebase and environmental variables).
one_liner: Cursor for Data Science — secure, AI-native IDE for data scientists

name: Cyberdesk
long_description:
Cyberdesk is the first self learning computer use agent for developers to automate desktop workflows. 

For example, one of our customers is building an AI agent for hospital patient intake, and they’re using us to automate an entire team of people manually clicking and typing into a desktop app to book appointments. 

We launched mid July, and our agent is already operating in production environments, creating appointments in electronic health record apps and processing files in legacy ERPs.

We’ve built the first computer use agent that memorizes tasks and repeats them quickly while still adapting to unexpected changes on the screen. A good analogy is to how humans use computers: once we get used to an app, we use it much faster, while still adapting to random popups and crashes. This new paradigm for computer use will be needed by every company automating human workflows on computers.

Mahmoud previously built robotic process automation solutions impacting 20K+ employees at a Fortune 100 company. He also built AI & ML solutions at Baylor College of Medicine Neuroscience & Texas Children's Hospital + co-published a paper at the Rice Networks Group. 

Alan is ex-NASA and previously dropped out to be the first founding engineer at a PearX startup. He is a second time founder, having previously built and scaled a consumer AI app to thousands of paying users.

Computer-use agents will automate the $6T dollars spent on enterprise knowledge work and Cyberdesk will be the platform to power this.

We’d love to talk with you!
https://cal.com/mahmoud-al-madi-klrs5s/30min
one_liner: Self learning computer use agent for developers
tags: ['Artificial Intelligence', 'Developer Tools', 'Robotic Process Automation', 'Workflow Automation', 'Enterprise Software']

name: Janet AI
long_description:
Janet AI is the AI-first ticket management system, built for modern engineering teams.

Ticket management today is too reliant on manual work. Context gets scattered. Information doesn’t stay-up-to date. Systems get noisy.

We integrate with your information channels (meetings, Slack, Discord, SMS, etc.) to auto-create, update, and organize work items.
one_liner: The AI-Native Jira

name: Lilac
long_description: Lilac taps idle GPUs from cloud providers and enterprises, giving startups and researchers cheaper compute while letting companies monetize unused capacity. Fully automated with Kubernetes integration.
one_liner: Spot GPUs that use idle GPUs from enterprises

name: Frizzle
long_description:
Frizzle uses AI to grade handwritten math assignments for teachers and transform them into rich analytics and differentiated assessment to help personalize instruction for every student. Teachers spend over 10 hours a week or 25% of all their work grading - Frizzle does it in minutes. Frizzle is the most valuable piece of software for teachers ever, as it eliminates the most time-consuming part of their workflow so they can focus on teaching.

Frizzle was named an official White House AI Education Partner alongside OpenAI and Meta: https://www.whitehouse.gov/edai/.

Frizzle was co-founded by Abhay Gupta and Shyam Sai, who met in high school over 10 years ago.
one_liner: AI Grading for Teachers

name: Keystone
long_description: Keystone is an AI engineer that joins your team and understands your product from codebase to production. It can triage tickets, fix bugs, and automatically resolve incidents, autonomously.
one_liner: Your team's on-call AI engineer

name: DeepAware AI
long_description:
DeepAware builds an AI-driven automation system for GPU-intensive data centers. Our reinforcement-learning scheduler, real-time market integration, and unified dashboard slice energy waste by up to 30%. Coming soon: autonomous “robot-hand” inspections and maintenance to enable 24/7 operations with minimal staff.

More info: https://deepawareai.com/
Jobs/Internship: https://www.deepawareai.com/careers
one_liner: Help AI data centers unlock more compute and become more efficient

name: Kestroll
long_description: The AI operating system for modern brand and marketing teams that automates digital asset management and creative operations.
one_liner: AI Digital Asset Manager

name: cocreate
long_description: Before editing begins, professional video teams spend days copying, organizing, and prepping footage — a process that can eat up 40% of a project’s time and budget. CoCreate runs in the background during backup, delivering fully organized, searchable, and edit-ready projects for Premiere, Avid, Final Cut, or Resolve the moment media is offloaded. The result: faster turnarounds, fewer errors, and more time spent actually editing.
one_liner: AI-native video production software that automates post-production

name: Kalinda
long_description:
Kalinda helps class action law firms qualify potential cases in minutes with AI.

The nature of class action/mass torts involves thousands of cases for a single lawsuit. For every plaintiff (injured person), law firms involved in these cases compile everything from the products they used to the injuries they have. This data is extensive, granular, and buried deep in thousands of pages of medical, financial, and employment records and others.

Kalinda extracts, summarizes, and aggregates data from these records for attorneys with AI.

When scaled across an entire litigation, Kalinda works tirelessly and in parallel—turning a process that once took months into just a few hours. 

Kalinda provides firms with the equivalent manpower of hundreds of paralegals and legal nurses, allowing them to quickly determine which claimants are eligible and helping them file faster and in greater volume.

To date, we’ve processed 600k pages of records and are live with 2 of the largest plaintiff law firms in the U.S!
one_liner: Deep research for class action law firms

name: Doe
long_description: Doe embeds intelligent, task‑specific AI agents inside private‑equity‑owned service groups, starting with dental service organizations. The platform plugs into practice management, ERP, communication tools, and supplier catalogs to run procurement, approvals, scheduling, and analytics end‑to‑end, delivering immediate EBITDA lift and data visibility.
one_liner: Autonomous AI workforce for PE roll-ups

name: Fulcrum
long_description:
We build red-teaming agents that help developers fix their RL environments and improve their agents.

Our customers are tired of being bullshitted by their agents.
one_liner: The agentic debugger for AI systems

name: b-12
long_description:
b-12 is an AI copilot that plans how to create and test new molecules for chemists. We're like a GPS for chemistry, helping pharma companies plan the recipes for new drugs, accelerating early-stage drug discovery from years to months. 
Andres built the first AI agent that can autonomously think and make molecules in a robotic lab, published in Nature Machine Intelligence (750+ citations), and won the best paper award at the NeurIPS AI for Science conference.
Zlatko is a 3x National Chemistry Olympiad champion, competed at IChO level, and medicinal chemist who has worked at Roche and leading lab robotics companies. He has an extensive network of hundreds of chemists across Europe.
We are publishing a groundbreaking paper in Nature demonstrating our AI's ability to optimally plan chemical recipes. We run paid pilots with big pharma companies showing that our platform planned a set of experiments that achieved full conversion in a single attempt, eliminating the usual 8-12 iteration cycle.
one_liner: Chemical Copilot for Pharma and Biotech

name: Embedder
long_description: Embedder is a coding agent that can write, test, and debug firmware on both physical and simulated hardware. Supporting 20+ MCU/SoC platforms, it accelerates embedded systems development across semiconductors, automotive, medical devices, aerospace, IoT, and consumer electronics.
one_liner: Cursor for Firmware

name: Candytrail
long_description: We’re building the optimization platform for in-person sales teams. Our agents capture every customer interaction and surface insights on winning talk tracks, common objections, and revenue drivers. We have already delivered an average 13% lift in revenue for customers in pharma, real estate, and retail.
one_liner: AI agents for in-person sales teams, starting with coaching

name: Epicenter
long_description:
Epicenter is an ecosystem of open-source, local-first apps. We store all your work—notes, transcripts, chat histories—in a single folder of plain text and SQLite. Every tool we build shares this memory: your text editor, personal assistant, etc.. It's open, tweakable, and yours. Grep it, open it in Obsidian, host it wherever you like. The choice is yours.

Our vision is to build a personal workspace where you own your data, choose your own AI models, and replace siloed apps with open, interoperable alternatives. All while preserving authenticity and being free and open source. ❤️
one_liner: Open-source, local-first apps that share a memory.

name: Hyprnote
long_description: Hyprnote is the first open-source AI notetaker for the enterprise. It runs fully on-device or on-prem, ensuring that no data ever leaves your system. Hyprnote transcribes and summarizes conversations automatically, turning discussions into actionable knowledge without risking security or regulatory breaches. Unlike cloud-based tools like Granola or Otter, Hyprnote is built for industries where data control is non-negotiable - tech firms, finance, healthcare, government, and beyond.
one_liner: Open-source AI notetaker for the enterprise

name: April
long_description: April is a voice AI Executive assistant that manages your email and calendar, hands free. It’s built for busy individuals who need EAs but don’t have them.
one_liner: Voice AI Executive Assistant

name: Knowlify
long_description:
Everyone loves the way 3Blue1Brown explains complex ideas. Now imagine having that same level of clarity for any topic, tailored to each learner’s needs.

That’s what we’re building at Knowlify.

Current use cases:
- Researchers turn dense papers into clear, digestible explanations
- Textbook publishers help students grasp challenging concepts
- Universities produce high-quality content while cutting costs by 90%
- Corporations keep teams sharp and up to date on the latest technologies

With Knowlify, the possibilities for learning are limitless.
one_liner: Convert textual content into explainer videos in < 15s

name: Minimal AI
long_description: Minimal AI makes it easy for e-commerce brands to build and manage AI support teams that resolve 80%+ of tickets while increasing revenue.
one_liner: AI Agents for E-commerce Customer Support

name: Humoniq
long_description:
Humoniq is building the first AI-Native BPO for the travel & transport industries, which outsource $20B of customer support each year. Our AI-native approach improves speed, accuracy, and satisfaction.

Our team is uniquely equipped to solve this challenge. We previously grew a travel management company, Flightfox (YC S12), to $22M/yr. We handled thousands of customer requests each month, which exposed the limitations of traditional outsourcing.
one_liner: AI-Native BPO for travel & transport

name: Eden
long_description:
Eden runs marketing for ecommerce brands. Our AI agents can autonomously schedule campaigns, run A/B tests, and personalize experiences across email, SMS, site display, and more, so brand founders get enterprise-level marketing without needing a team or agency.

Alex and Jason have been best friends for 8+ years. They met at TJHSST, became nationally ranked debate partners, and later coworkers at Datadog. Alex led operations at an AI shopping startup, working directly with brands like TheRealReal, Poshmark, and Farfetch. Jason was at Reddit's mobile ad retargeting team and is a second-time founder, previously exiting an AI recruiting startup doing $50K MRR.
one_liner: Autonomous Marketing AI for Ecommerce Brands

name: Metis
long_description: We build infrastructure enabling AI agents to reliably perform complex tasks in production
one_liner: Infrastructure to build reliable agents

name: F4
long_description:
Built by former Tesla & SpaceX engineers, F4 is a platform that helps you catch and fix drawing compliance issues instantly. F4 ensures design engineers never release noncompliant drawings—and suppliers never misinterpret them. We help hardware teams eliminate costly scrap, rework, and miscommunication at the root.

With a compliant drawing, F4 generates end-to-end drawing interpretations for standard definitions, inspection plan, and tolerance analysis application.

F4 automatically interprets all GD&T symbols, datums, and notes based on the correct standards - no more second-guessing or misreading intent. Everyone from design to manufacturing sees the same definition, keeping teams aligned and avoiding costly miscommunication.

F4 generates a complete inspection plan straight from the drawing, so quality teams know exactly what to measure, how, and where. This eliminates manual setup, reduces delays during first article inspection, and helps catch issues before they reach production.

F4 gives engineers everything they need from the drawing to set up a reliable tolerance analysis, applicable features, and rule exceptions. By making it easy to bridge engineering drawings to tolerance analysis, teams can catch potential fit or function issues early - before parts are fabricated and assembled.
one_liner: Automating compliance checks for engineering drawings

name: Convexia
long_description:
An AI-maximalist pharma platform. We use agents to buy drugs, run clinical trials, and sell for a profit. 10x faster and 20x leaner than incumbents.

Sourcing Agent: Mines public/private databases and unstructured global data to surface overlooked preclinical candidates.
Scientific Agent: Runs comp bio models (ESM-3, RFdiffusion, Boltz-2, AlphaFold) to assess safety and efficacy in silico.
Commercial Agent: Analyzes FDA incentives, pricing dynamics, TAM, competitive landscape, and payer alignment.
Clinical Agent: Runs digital twin simulations, evaluates CRO/CMC risk, and builds trial plans to Phase 1.
BD Agent: Summarizes and delivers company-tailored pitches. 

Built by 2 Stanford CS students who have built 3 startups together before.
one_liner: The world's first AI-maximalist pharma company

name: Fernstone
long_description:
Fernstone is an AI-powered insurance brokerage for high-risk businesses. We are competing with the 40,000 insurance brokers that sell $500B in commercial premium each year.

Before starting Fernstone, Luke and James met at Traba (Series A) when they started on the same day. Luke led a Growth team, closing some of Traba’s largest customers like JB Hunt and Kimberly Clark. James created and led Traba’s Enterprise function, growing it to 25% of company revenue. Bryant, James’ classmate from high school, was a Software Engineer at SentiLink and Google.
one_liner: AI-powered insurance brokerage for high-risk businesses.

name: AutoAce
long_description: AutoAce is building the AI native operating system for car dealerships. We start with AI service advisors that answer calls and book appointments, so no call is missed and no revenue is lost. Our mission is to connect service, sales, parts, finance, and insurance into one platform, transforming dealerships from reactive operations into proactive systems that anticipate customer needs.
one_liner: AI-native operating system for car dealerships

name: Certus AI
long_description:
Certus AI is replacing the restaurant phone line with Voice AI.

Restaurants lose up to $100,000 per year per location from missed calls, lost orders, and abandoned hold lines. Staff are overwhelmed. IVRs frustrate customers. Call centers are expensive and impersonal.

It’s 2025. Guests don’t leave voicemails or wait on hold. They just move on.

Certus is an AI voice agent built for restaurants. It answers every call, 24/7 — taking orders, processing deliveries, booking reservations, upselling, and handling complaints in English, Spanish, French and more. Certus is built to manage the phone line end to end, from the customer call to the restaurant tech stack, with zero human intervention required. It currently integrates with industry-leading systems like Toast, Square, Clover, UberEats, DoorDash, and more.

We’re building the voice layer of the modern restaurant — the employee they’ll never fire.

We started Certus because we lived the pain. Gurveer (CEO) grew up answering phones in his family’s restaurant and helped operate them, growing from 1 to 11 locations in 7 years. Later, he and Adam (CRO) ran a restaurant growth startup to help others increase revenue, but kept watching clients bleed cash because no one picked up the phone. So we built the solution the industry always wished existed.

Until now, this problem was considered unsolvable. But Voice AI has finally crossed the conversational chasm and 72% of consumers now prefer AI over humans as long as it means faster and better service.

More importantly, the market is begging for this. The North American restaurant industry crossed $1 trillion in 2024, and it's projected to hit $1.5 trillion in 2025. Yet over $100 billion is still lost annually to missed calls, human error, and outdated tech. As the market continues to grow, so do the losses!

Our customers say it best:

- “Certus changed my life overnight.”
- “We were losing the ability to give great in-house service — the phone was killing us.”
-  “70% of my business comes through the phone. That’s mine and my 16 staffs livelihood.”
- “Before Certus, I used to lose 40 - 60 calls a day…. now my printer just stays printing!”
-  “I’ve been in the business 38 years. I’ve been waiting for this since then.”

Certus is here to fix the $120B phone problem — one call at a time.

And in doing so, we’re redefining how the restaurant industry communicates forever, starting with the phone line.
one_liner: Replacing the restaurant phone line with Voice AI

name: Kernel
long_description:
Kernel is the best place in the world to launch web agents. We handle the hard parts of running browser infrastructure in the cloud so you don’t have to: spinning up browsers quickly, responsive read/write live view, logs, headless vs. headful mode, replays, residential proxies, and more. Our API allows developers to instantly launch browsers in the cloud, so you can focus on your core product logic rather than the infra underneath.

Our customers use Kernel to launch QA agents, vertical-specific agents that automate back office processes, and more.

We're open source, HIPAA-compliant (SOC2 Type 2 pending), & compatible with every browser/web agent framework (Playwright, Puppeteer, CUA, Browser Use, Magnitude, etc). Check us out —> https://github.com/onkernel/kernel-images
one_liner: Crazy Fast Browsers-as-a-Service

name: Juxta
long_description:
Juxta is creating the first Universal Positioning System (UPS) — a GPS alternative that can monitor movement anywhere on earth with no new hardware, minimal internet connection, and remote deployment. Using custom machine learning models and a first-of-its-kind synthetic fingerprinting technology, Juxta can make any indoor, outdoor, or underground space location-aware in minutes for a fraction of the cost of any other geospatial technology.

Juxta's UPS can be leveraged across industries — from securely tracking soldiers in combat zones to providing offline positioning for robots to offering asset tracking in warehouses and ports around the globe.
one_liner: Building a GPS alternative 100x more powerful with no hardware needed.

name: Flywheel AI
long_description: Flywheel AI converts any existing excavators for contractors to enable remote ops to increase safety and productivity, and use robotics context dataset to train autonomous policies.
one_liner: Waymo for excavators

name: Clodo
long_description: Clodo is AI for Large Scale Construction. We build AI agents that support teams and automate busy work for the largest general contractors in the country.
one_liner: AI For Large Scale Construction

name: Modelence
long_description:
You built the demo in a weekend. Now you need auth, a prod-grade database, real-time events, AI observability, cron jobs, email, monitoring… and you needed them yesterday.

We spent a decade at our previous startup, building a platform while scaling to millions of users and customers like Meta & Netflix. Now we put that into an open-source framework, so others wouldn’t have to do the same from scratch.

Modelence is a batteries-included framework that abstracts away boilerplate so you can just focus on building your product logic and nothing else - it’s like Next.js + Vercel + Supabase on a single platform, built for full-stack TypeScript.

Shipping production apps is much harder than building a prototype that runs locally and 95% of all production apps share the same building blocks. We did a massive amount of work on our previous platforms that was not specific to our product, and we’ve created Modelence to abstract that away:
- Authentication
- Database setup
- Hosting / CDN
- AI integration (LLM observability, prompts)
- Real-time events
- Cron jobs
- Email service
- Monitoring
- Analytics
- Admin dashboards

Andrej Karpathy recently posted about this same exact problem:
https://x.com/karpathy/status/1905051558783418370

and explained it further in his YC AI Startup School talk:
https://youtu.be/LCEmiRjPEtQ?feature=shared&t=1940
one_liner: All-in-one TypeScript cloud for production AI apps

name: Duranium
long_description:
China and Russia control the world’s critical minerals. We can produce Titanium, Magnesium, Aluminum, Zirconium & Hafnium in the U.S. more profitably than any existing process, and carbon neutrally via co-production.

Carbochlorination is the primary process for producing critical metals like titanium, hafnium, and zirconium, and was once the standard for magnesium. The problem: conventional carbochlorination relies on purchasing carbon feedstocks, wastes valuable byproducts, and is highly CO₂-intensive.

Duranium changes this with a novel reactor that recycles CO₂ emissions back into feedstock (CO) while generating a valuable co-product (bleaching agents). This closed loop slashes emissions and delivers Chinese-level metal pricing without subsidies — unlocking the full potential of carbochlorination for U.S. critical mineral production.
one_liner: Reshoring critical metal production

name: burnt
long_description:
Food Supply Chain companies have been using legacy ERPs for decades. Everyone knows these are necessary evils that essentially run the business but take up a lot of operational capacity. They are not about to just rip and replace their existing system that runs their whole business with a system that takes years to implement. Imagine if they could implement AI that runs the ERP for them, in weeks?

Burnt’s building an agentic OS for the Food Supply Chain with AI Agents for each department. 

Our AI Agent, Ozai, has started by replacing the whole order management job function at food distribution companies, so that sales and customer service teams can focus on what matters - the customer. Ozai monitors all incoming messages (emails, phone calls, voicemails, whatsapp, fax etc.), figures out if it's an order, learns each customer's habits, shorthand, and favorite products, picks up on any prep notes, and enters it straight into the existing ERP. It'll even go back to the customers on your behalf when it's not sure about something, clarify things and carry on working. 

The more it sees, the smarter it gets.
one_liner: Agentic Operating System for Food Supply Chain

name: Freya
one_liner: Voice AI for Enterprises

name: Digipals
long_description:
Social networks are dead. Social media became more media than social. My friends aren't on social media anymore - it's one third ads, one third content from strangers, and one third AI slop. Our social lives are fragmented across dozens of different apps - iMessage, WhatsApp, Find My, Partiful, and Venmo. 

Digipals is the first AI-native social operating system that improves our relationships with friends. We built ambient AI agents that use social context from our location, calendar, and photos to take action and write code in our group chats. We are the last social platform anyone will ever need.

Launch Video
https://youtu.be/KW2tjLl6sxM
one_liner: The future of Social in the age of AI

name: Efference
long_description: Efference builds the eyes and visual cortex for robots. Instead of treating depth as a hardware problem, we use software — inspired by how humans see — to generate rich and reliable 3D information. This lets us deliver higher performance and greater ease of use at a lower price than existing stereo cameras.
one_liner: We build the eyes and visual cortex for robots.

name: Lapis
long_description:
Lapis is the most accurate AI search analytics platform.

We help businesses understand the full buyer journey on AI assistants like ChatGPT and Perplexity, from discovery to purchase.

We do this through a custom RL environment that's fine-tuned for AI assistant prompts.
one_liner: The Most Accurate AI Search Analytics Platform

name: AirCaps
long_description:
AirCaps is bringing AI assistance to in-person conversations. 

Our AI-copilot provides live captions, translations, AI meeting notes and insights for in-person conversations in real-time. It's deployed as an app for lightweight AR glasses so you can see visual information overlaid onto your field of vision.

You can think of it like a Zoom AI meeting assistant or Granola, but for in-person conversations, and with the ability to proactively help you in real-time, not just after the conversation.

We’re building the capture and intelligence layer for the 216 billion daily conversations that happen face-to-face.

We’ve already processed 16,500 hours of real-world conversations and counting. Today, AirCaps assists with 11% of our users’ in-person conversations.

We did $93K in revenue in October and grew 6.5x from September while spending <$3K on marketing (and hit $70K in revenue in the first 2 weeks of November). Our power users average 6h+ daily usage and our day-30 retention is 91%.

We previously went viral (75M+ views on TikTok, 150K+ followers) and have been featured by The New Yorker, WIRED, and Forbes.

Madhav (CEO, Yale CS) has been building in audio and AR since age 13, starting with Google Glass apps and voice assistants for Raspberry Pis. He researched audio AI at the MIT Media Lab. Nirbhay (CTO, Cornell CS) built voice AI on smart glasses in high school and built conversational AI products as the first engineer at 2 YC startups.
one_liner: The AI copilot for in-person conversations.

name: Hyperspell
long_description:
Hyperspell (YC F25) gives AI agents memory.

It connects to tools like Slack, Gmail, Notion, and Drive so agents can recall, reason, and remember across company knowledge. Developers use Hyperspell’s API to turn disconnected agents into AI coworkers that understand their work. Conor and Manu founded Hyperspell after building their own workplace agent and seeing how limited AI is without memory. They have over 15 years of experience in machine learning and have scaled API-based products to $30M ARR.
one_liner: Memory for AI Agents

name: Deeptrace
long_description:
At Deeptrace, we’re building AI agents that investigate and resolve production alerts end-to-end. Deeptrace cuts through the noise, pinpoints root causes instantly, and gives engineering teams back what they need most: the freedom to build instead of firefighting.

In production, we're already seeing a reduction in time spent triaging, investigating, and resolving alerts with some of the fastest growing companies in the world.
one_liner: AI agents for on-call

name: Alt-X
long_description:
Private markets are still opaque, manual, and locked inside Excel. Every year, trillions of dollars in venture, real-estate, and private-equity capital are deployed through diligence processes that haven’t changed in decades. Analysts spend hours parsing PDFs and spreadsheets just to understand what a company or property is worth.

Alt-X is building the data and AI infrastructure layer for alternative assets — a system that ingests unstructured deal materials, normalizes the data, and generates institutional-grade analysis in seconds. Whether it’s a private-company dataroom or a real-estate offering memorandum, Alt-X extracts key KPIs like ARR, growth, NOI, IRR, and cap rate, then produces investor-ready dashboards and reports automatically.

Our platform reduces deal evaluation timelines by up to 73%, saves 30–50 analyst hours per deal, and enables teams to screen 4× more opportunities with the same headcount. By automating KPI extraction, benchmarking, and underwriting, Alt-X transforms diligence from a manual bottleneck into a scalable process.

This hasn’t been done at scale because private-market data is fragmented across formats and asset classes. Alt-X’s parsing engine unifies this chaos into a structured schema — the backbone for cross-asset underwriting, KPI dashboards, and automated risk scoring.

Our first wedge is real estate and private equity, where underwriting is slowest and most manual. We’re already piloting with family offices and private funds managing over $200 million in assets, paying $1K–$5K per month to automate deal screening and valuation.

The opportunity is massive: over $1.4 trillion in new private-equity and real-estate deals are underwritten globally each year, with $25–30 billion spent on diligence and analytics. Yet over 90% of this still happens manually. Alt-X’s mission is to become the operating system for private-market investing — the Bloomberg Terminal of the AI era.
one_liner: AI Diligence Tools for Private Investors

name: Caddy
long_description:
We are building Siri for work, but it actually works. Caddy turns your voice into the next computing interface. It understands what’s on your screen and your intent, so work gets done while you stay in flow.

Say “create a Linear ticket and share it to Slack” and Caddy handles it instantly in the background.

Caddy’s founders previously led product and design for Loom’s AI suite and core products. We believe the next era of computing will be powered by voice, where computers understand what you say and what’s on your screen so work happens naturally.
one_liner: The voice interface that works proactively for you

name: Dari
long_description:
An automation platform where users can reliably automate web workflows using natural language prompts.

We handle two-factor authentication and deterministic playback of workflows, ensuring your workflows don't break.
one_liner: An API to build the most reliable browser use agents

name: Lunavo
long_description:
We build AI that runs carrier operations.

Lunavo is the AI assistant for carriers. It plugs directly into their existing toolstack, understands their processes, and monitors all incoming data and requests. Lunavo runs end-to-end backoffice operations, handling repetitive tasks, resolving issues autonomously, and escalating only what matters.

Lunavo helps carriers scale operations without scaling headcount.
one_liner: Lunavo is the AI assistant for carriers.

name: Kaigo Health
long_description: Kaigo Health provides an AI-powered outpatient care management platform that automates and scales remote care management for Medicare patients including post-discharge followups, ongoing check-ins, and monitoring. Using phone calls as an age-friendly interface, we aggregate patient responses, voice biomarkers, and remote patient monitoring data for powerful preventative and proactive healthcare.
one_liner: AI outpatient care workforce

name: Koyal
long_description:
Koyal is an Agentic AI Filmmaking Platform that allows you to seamlessly convert script or audio into personalized, visually compelling stories. We’re a team from Carnegie Mellon, MIT and Meta, with experience in AI video generation.

https://koyal.ai builds directly upon our published research at the AI conference NeurIPS in December. We’ve been covered in the international press for our patented secure personalization protocol CHARCHA: the genAI captcha.

Announcement: https://x.com/meh_agarwal/status/1965866965425348687
Demo: https://x.com/meh_agarwal/status/1965137062119752099


We currently have paid pilots with the biggest global music labels, podcasts and production houses, and just launched our public beta at beta.koyal.ai

We recently concluded a pilot with Universal Music and T-Series (world’s largest music label) alongside Bollywood production houses like Maddock Entertainment, and Collective Artists Network! As part of that, we launched 5 music videos for Grammy and Oscar winning artists like A R Rahman, Ricky Kej and Shankar Mahadevan all crossing 1.5 million views!

We've recently built SOTA capabilities in (i) multilingual script to audio to video, (ii) Agentic lip-sync with dynamic movement & (iii) Multi-character consistency.
one_liner: Agentic AI Filmmaking Platform

name: Iris
long_description:
Iris connects all your calendars and inboxes in one place with a built in personal assistant. It connects with Gmail, Google Calendar, Maps, and more to understand your context - what you’re working on, who you’re meeting, and where you need to be - and intelligently organizes your time around what actually matters. 

Unlike assistants that just schedule events, Iris learns your rhythm and automates your workflow: drafting emails, moving meetings, blocking focus time, and coordinating across accounts, all with your approval. 

We’re building the next generation of personal AI, one that keeps you ahead.
one_liner: The Digital Extension of Yourself

name: Cranston AI
long_description:
Cranston is a full stack AI accounting firm automating the $900b market for accounting labor. Our software automates reconciliation, tax compliance and financial analysis for startups & SMBs. We pull in context from all your company's apps & data, connect to existing systems of record and handle repetitive accounting work.

Our team is deep in the accounting space. Sean spent 5 years building an ERP after dropping out of Stanford and Max spent 5 years building an accounting firm that did every accounting workflow you can imagine on top of ERPs.
one_liner: Full Stack AI Accounting Firm

name: Hypercubic
long_description:
Hypercubic is an AI-native maintenance and modernization platform for COBOL and mainframes.

We help enterprises understand and preserve their mission-critical legacy systems. About 70% of the Fortune 500 companies still rely on them to run their core business applications in banking, insurance, telecom, airlines, retail, and more.

These systems, originally built in the 1960s–90s, still power trillions in global infrastructure today but have become increasingly opaque as original developers retire or leave the workforce. 

We're laying the foundation to autonomously maintain and modernize these legacy systems to future-proof the backbone of the global economy.


Learn more at hypercubic.ai
one_liner: AI to maintain and modernize COBOL.

name: AtlasGrid
long_description: AtlasGrid automatically builds a visual graph of your mobile app UI and displays analytics directly on your screens. Additionally, our fleet of AI-powered agents will continuously analyze thousands of mobile apps, gathering design insights and identifying growth opportunities + actionable product improvements.
one_liner: Accelerate Product Iteration

name: hillclimb
long_description: We derive training data from the world's brightest minds, enabling LLMs to achieve state-of-the-art model performance.
one_liner: The world's first human superintelligence community

name: Flick
long_description:
Flick is an AI filmmaking software that lets people create Hollywood-level short films completely using AI end-to-end.

There are many AI tools that can give you 8-second casual clips to post on social media, but when it comes to creating truly high-quality films with coherent storylines, consistent characters, and cinematic aesthetics, they don’t come close due to their lack of flexibility, creative control, and fragmented creative flow.

Founded by an award-winning filmmaker and a founding engineer at Instagram, Flick defines an interface specifically designed for native AI filmmaking that feels natural and enables end-to-end creative flows. Think of Flick as Figma for AI filmmaking.

There are 4 complete AI short films created using Flick that got 20+ awards in international film festivals already and our early creator residency community are generating several AI short films every week.

We are also building a community where we produce our own AI films as well as collaborating with other well-known filmmakers to share their “behind-the-scenes” workflows as resuable templates to inspire users in our community. We not only build product, we also build world-class content.

The whole film industry will be revolutionized by AI and our goal is to be “the product” that defines this category.
one_liner: Figma + Cursor, for AI Filmmaking

name: Lakonia
long_description: Lakonia is building an AI-powered command and control platform for law enforcement and the military. Our AI transcribes radio communications, analyzes them, and then synthesizes information for commanders/dispatchers and operators to act on.
one_liner: Delivering AI-powered situational awareness in tactical environments.

name: AnswerThis
long_description:
AnswerThis is a scientific discovery platform used by over 200,000 researchers that reduces weeks of manual research work to hours. 

Instead of manually searching, reading, and organizing dozens of papers, researchers use AnswerThis to find the most relevant work, see how ideas are connected, and get comprehensive answers to complex scientific questions with line by line answers. 

This allows them to map research gaps, analyze trends, and draft literature reviews far faster, all while building a searchable library of their own research materials.
one_liner: AI platform helping 200k+ researchers accelerate scientific discovery

name: LogosGuard
long_description: Enterprises are racing to adopt AI, but often don't have the right controls in place or know how to verify vendors are compliant. LogosGuard turns AI policies into executable controls, stress-tests your AI products, and continuously monitors changes, giving enterprises the confidence to scale AI responsibly.
one_liner: The risk management software for enterprises adopting AI

name: Kestrel AI
long_description: Kestrel is an AI-native cloud incident response platform that brings self-healing to cloud infrastructure. It monitors cloud and kubernetes infrastructure 24/7, finds root causes, and generates exact fixes - so incidents get resolved in seconds instead of hours.
one_liner: AI-Native Cloud Incident Response Platform

name: Agentic Fabriq
long_description: Agentic Fabriq is the single control plane for data permissioning throughout your entire organization across your AI and employees. Through Fabriq, any employee can tap into AI/agents with exactly the data and tools they're cleared to use by an admin. Fabriq can be used internally with employees or externally for customers while handling the auth + integrations + permissions securely for you.
one_liner: Okta for Agents.

name: Logical
long_description: Logical is a desktop AI that acts as a proactive and largely promptless copilot, designed to reduce the friction of using AI for everyday tasks. It transfers context across apps, and allows taking action on many apps with just a few clicks. Logical can assist with drafting emails, writing docs, noting meetings and can even automatically detect action items. Need to prompt? Logical can understand intent in much fewer words than a regular chatbot. Plus, user data is never sent to Logical servers. Logical is the AI resurrection of Clippy, but actually good.
one_liner: A proactive desktop copilot. Clippy, but actually good.

name: Aleph Lab
long_description: An AI companion that chats and plays with children inside games like Minecraft, helping them learn a new language while they play. Kids already spend hours each week in their favorite games, and now parents can turn that game time into learning time.
one_liner: AI language buddy in the games kids love

name: Articulate
long_description:
We help construction teams eliminate rework, delays, and drawing confusion before construction starts. We analyze PDF plans, detect clashes and inconsistencies across disciplines, and create draft RFIs so teams can resolve issues early.

What we do:
- Automatically detect clashes, missing information, and drawing mismatches
- Align architectural, structural, and MEP plans so everything matches across sheets
- Generate draft RFIs from issues we find
- Replace long page-turn meetings with instant drawing analysis
- Reduce rework and prevent schedule delays before boots hit the ground

We integrate with: Procore, Autodesk, email, and the tools teams already use

Teams use us to:
- Save hundreds of thousands to millions of dollars per project
- Catch design and coordination issues early
- Reduce RFIs and prevent field fixes
- Keep projects on schedule with fewer surprises

Contact us at founders@usearticulate.com
one_liner: Automatic Construction Drawing Clash Detection

name: Captain
long_description:
Captain delivers the most accurate general-purpose retrieval engine for unstructured data.

Connect file stores and effortlessly retrieve knowledge with much higher accuracy than RAG (Avg: 78% → 95% + citations).
one_liner: The Reliable Alternative to RAG

name: Bravi
long_description:
We automate customer communication with AI voice and chat assistants that answer, qualify, and follow up instantly. Internally, Bravi gives field and technical teams an AI copilot that can search hundreds of product documents and installation guides in seconds.

Bravi is already used by leading installers and manufacturers across shutters, solar, windows and garage doors. One customer uncovered more than a thousand missed calls per month that Bravi now handles automatically, converting lost demand into new business.

We’re becoming the AI layer for the multi-trillion-dollar home-services market.
one_liner: AI Communication hub for home services companies

name: Lexi
long_description: At Lexi, we are building AI associates for Corporate Law. Our associates learn your firm's standards and improve with every case, having already handled 135,000+ documents across 7,000+ cases.
one_liner: AI Associates for Corporate Law

name: Compyle
long_description:
Compyle is a less autonomous coding agent that asks before it acts. We're like Cursor or Claude Code - but you won't need to rewrite your codebase every time you use it for more than a small task.

We built Compyle because we were frustrated with the direction other coding agents are headed. They're all racing to be more autonomous, running for hours without human input.

This doesn't work for real production code. When agents run autonomously, they make countless small decisions that pile up in your codebase. Engineers lose ownership - they don't know what was implemented, can't effectively debug or maintain it, and struggle to build on top of it. The code becomes a black box, and they're forced to throw it away.

Compyle keeps engineers in the driver's seat.
one_liner: The coding agent that actually collaborates with you

name: Casey
long_description: Casey is the fastest way for commercial insurance brokers to submit complex risks. We automate client data collection, build risk profiles, and prepare carrier-ready submissions for wholesalers and underwriters in minutes.
one_liner: Casey automates workflows for the insurance industry

name: Inspector
long_description:
Inspector helps front-end engineers ship faster with AI by automating the most frustrating part of the job — gathering context between the browser and the codebase.

Inspector is an AI IDE for front-end that connects your browser and codebase. Inspector lets you select elements visually and prompt changes, giving coding agents access to the same runtime context developers have: visuals, elements, and logs. 

With Inspector, you’re editing right in the front-end, not buried under tabs and screenshots.
one_liner: AI IDE for front-end development

name: Cortex AI
long_description:
Cortex AI builds the world’s most diverse and large-scale real-world workplace robot & egocentric dataset — where the physical world becomes the next training and evaluation set for embodied AI.

We power frontier labs developing robotics foundation models and general-purpose robots by providing the data they need:
1️⃣ Egocentric Data — real-workplace human video with hand/body pose, depth, and subtask labels.
2️⃣ Robot Data — trajectories collected from manipulators and humanoids in real industry settings.
3️⃣ Human-in-the-Loop Rollouts & Evals — real-world deployments with remote operators who recover robots when they fail, capturing data that feeds back into training and continuously improves models.

Additionally, through the Cortex Marketplace, workplaces get paid to host data-collection and evaluation sessions, while labs access the in-the-wild data that truly matters. This draws on Lucas’s previous experience as co-founder of Carousell, a C2C marketplace that scaled to a $1B+ valuation.
one_liner: Large-scale real-world robot & human data for embodied AI

name: Leadbay
long_description:
Our customers 5× prospecting efficiency by simply unlocking untapped opportunities in the most data-scarce, fragmented markets - like construction, hospitality, startups, and retail.

You might think that LinkedIn Sales Nav, Clay, ZoomInfo, or Apollo have you covered. They don’t. We’ve built an engaging prospecting app for sales reps that simply could not have existed before. ⁠Our AI can extrapolate missing information, source leads, and qualify B2B prospects at scale - especially in industries with a low digital footprint, a market far larger than what legacy databases can cover.

Co-founders are Milan Stankovic (CTO) - PhD to make AI work with limited data, and Ludovic Granger (CEO). Small-to-enterprise teams in companies targeting SMBs in construction, hotels & restaurants, and retail grow with Leadbay, both in France and in the US.

Try us on leadbay.ai.
one_liner: Discover and qualify leads that couldn't be found before.

name: Anto Biosciences
long_description:
Anto Biosciences is building a foundation model for microbial communities, making the gut microbiome computable for the first time. We predict drug toxicity and efficacy across diverse populations and fix drugs so they work for everyone — solving the hidden root cause of most drug failures. 

Founded by Arvid (Broad Institute of MIT and Harvard; Nature-published researcher who pioneered quality-aware, goal-directed sparsification) and David (Harvard Medical School Gastroenterology, J&J), second-time founders who published the breakthrough at leading machine learning AI conferences and Nature. 

We've caught a $1B cancer drug that worked in China but failed clinical trials in the U.S. With the help of our model, we are the first ones to know exactly why.

Anto is backed by Y Combinator (F25). https://www.anto.bio/
one_liner: A multimodal foundation model for microbial communities.

name: Imagine AI
long_description:
Imagine AI clones you, not just your voice. We build you online with high-fidelity personas that replicate how you think, write, and sell - so our AI can handle your entire B2B content pipeline: posts, strategic comments, blogs and content engineering to achieve content-market fit.

For B2B service firms and YC companies, this means turning founders' expertise into a pipeline-generating machine. Instead of executives spending 8+ hours a week trying to create content, our forward-deployed content engineers perform deep research to understand who you are -> your voice, your clients' pain points, your unique insights -> then ship and optimize content that books meetings at named accounts.

Our second-time founding team includes Sky Yang (raised $150M as UCSD's youngest Student Body President) and Neo Lee (a Berkeley Math/AI researcher who dropped out to build this). 

We launched in mid-July, now serve 40+ paying customers (Series-A,B and seed stage companies plus VCs, global franchises, and ghostwriting agencies). Achieving minimum 30%-70% week to week growth.

💡 Results:
$20 M+ total revenue generated across clients
$5 M deal closed from a single LinkedIn post
$40 K inbound revenue in 1.5 weeks for one client
200+ qualified inbounds in 1 month after hitting content-market fit

We’re not just another AI tool.

We’re forward-deployed content engineers, building the content OS for every LinkedIn-native B2B company.

📅 Book a demo: https://calendar.notion.so/meet/skyyang333/ghost

🔗 Connect with Sky: https://www.linkedin.com/in/skyyang/
one_liner: Your AI Clone for B2B Content

name: Everest
long_description:
Outsourced IT is a $350B industry running on 10-20% margins. We're building AI employees to help them solve support tickets faster and increase margins to 70-80%. 

Yolanda worked as a Senior Support Engineer at Netflix. Her team ran 3x more efficiently than average outsourced IT companies. We're now bringing the automation Netflix has to 150K companies globally.
one_liner: AI employees for outsourced IT

name: Aside
long_description:
Aside listens to your sales calls and surfaces real-time answers pulled from your docs, HubSpot, or past calls. It's like pressing 𝚌𝚝𝚛𝚕+𝚟 on your company’s knowledge into every rep – so anyone can sound like your best rep.

- 🔎 Shows answers from your docs, Slack, and past winning calls
- 📝 Live coaching that catches what reps miss: Aside spots what reps skip during calls and guides every rep to apply your playbook - BANT, SPICED, or your own - not after, live.
- 💬 Preload your cheatsheets as Live Cards: Turn your playbooks, FAQs, and notes into instant, in-call cards.
- 🎓 Coaching feedback, remembered by AI: Aside reviews every call, gives feedback, and turns it into live suggestions for your next one - so you never repeat the same mistake.
one_liner: Live answer copilot for enterprise tech sales

name: HireGlide
long_description: Hireglide is an AI screening tool for hiring teams. Instead of wading through 500 CVs, we screen them and surface the best candidates. In future, with access to millions of CVs, we will match candidates with relevant roles.
one_liner: AI screening and matching for hiring teams

name: Automax.ai
long_description: Automax.ai does property appraisals faster and more transparent. Our mobile app uses LiDAR and computer vision to capture property details automatically, and our custom-trained AI agents combine that data with all the analysis and aggregation required to to generate a complete appraisal report in minutes. The result is a clear, grounded valuation, fully Fannie Mae & Freddie Mac compliant — done in under 20 minutes from start to finish.
one_liner: AI native real-estate appraisal firm
subindustry: Real Estate and Construction -> Housing and Real Estate
industries: ['Real Estate and Construction', 'Housing and Real Estate']

name: Clad Labs
long_description: free codegen from brainrot workflows in your IDE.
one_liner: the brainrot ide

name: Absurd
long_description:
Absurd makes AI Brand and Performance ads at scale. Our last video for Kalshi ("Election Day") did 1M+ views, and we average 300K+ organic views across all videos. 

Our clients include Kalshi, Replit, Reforge, Gumloop, Micro1, and a couple YC and HF0 startups. 

We do this with a multi-agent orchestration layer to create production-quality videos in 72 hours. These agents collaborate with your team on Slack to plan, script, and generate every scene on an interactive canvas. From the canvas, your team can watch shotlists, image frames, and video renders come to life in real time — commenting, iterating, or generating new ideas alongside the agents.

Try it today at absurd.com
one_liner: AI Brand and Performance ads at scale

name: Kalpa Labs
long_description: We're building the next frontier of speech models. Generalist speech models that unlock in-context learning & strong instruction following for speech models alongside unifying existing speech capabilities like speech to text, text to speech, voice cloning, etc.
one_liner: Scaling Generalist Speech models

name: Metorial
long_description: Metorial is the infra layer for AI integrations. We built the only serverless MCP runtime that can maintain state with sub-second cold starts, built-in security, and monitoring. We make it easy for developers to connect AI agents to apps and data sources at scale.
one_liner: The infra layer for AI integrations.

name: Arcten
long_description: Arcten helps companies ship copilots that execute actions for users inside their product. You can add AI copilots to your product in minutes, connect them to your company’s information, and track how they’re performing -- all in one place.
one_liner: We provide action-taking copilots for every app

name: Denki
long_description:
Automate internal auditing (planning, testing, documenting) to comply better with financial regulations.

Denki performs audit work with 99% software, 1% services:

✔️ Works on existing systems (e.g. Auditboard, Workiva, ERPs)
✔️ Automates Control processes (e.g. collects evidence, runs walkthrough interviews, tests)
✔️ Records every step for traceability (workpapers w/ full audit trace)

Focused on SOX programs and financial regulations (SEC Rules etc.)
one_liner: The full-stack AI financial audit firm

name: Karumi
long_description:
Karumi is an AI agent that joins a live video call with your prospects to deliver personalized product demos, 24/7, in any language.

It bridges the gap between your landing page and your sales team by engaging visitors at the peak of their interest, turning curiosity into conversion. For those not ready to talk to sales but eager to explore, Karumi offers the next generation of interactive, self-guided demos.
one_liner: 24/7 AI demo agent for B2B SaaS

name: Mantle
long_description:
Mantle connects to all your tools: your CRM, Mail, Calendar, Payments, Product Analytics, and more. With just one prompt, you can create agents that handle back office work for you.

These agents can automate reports  and email them to you, drafts emails right in your email client, generates pre-meeting research directly in your calendar event, and much more. They run quietly in the background, react to changes in real time, follow a schedule or work when you chat with them. 

You didn’t start up to stay stuck in admin. Turn your company AI-native with Mantle.
one_liner: Build internal agents to automate back office work with one prompt

name: Lemma
long_description:
Lemma enables AI agents to continuously improve from user feedback and production outcomes. Instead of relying on manual prompt tuning and reactive debugging, Lemma detects when an agent’s performance drifts, pinpoints the exact step causing failures, generates optimized prompt candidates, and automatically delivers improvements through our API or by opening a pull request in your codebase. 

Built by ex-AI engineers who felt this pain firsthand, Lemma turns static agents into self-improving systems, helping teams ship reliable AI products faster with compounding performance gains over time. 

Deploy 1x. Learn forever.
one_liner: Continuous learning for AI agents

name: Exonic
long_description:
Exonic is building a global network of intelligence to cure all disease.

We are the first drug discovery company open to everyone.

Today drug discovery is siloed - secretive, adversarial institutions in glass towers.

Biological AI is changing the rules. Every day drug discovery becomes more of a computational problem.

Exonic is turning drug discovery into an open, meritocratic tournament.

We are advised by world leaders in bio AI, including the former Head of AI at Ginkgo Bioworks, and the first author of Evo (cover of Science). 

All of the best biological AI models are open source. And on Exonic, you can combine them, prompt them, and share your innovative workflows without writing a single line of code. 

Using Exonic Studio, we just beat a state-of-the-art benchmark in liver cancer (HepG2) synthetic enhancer design, validated in our wet lab.

The platform just went live - you can start right now.

We are turning the internet into a drug discovery powerhouse.
one_liner: Crowdsourcing drug discovery.

name: Jarmin
long_description:
Jarmin.ai is your 24/7 ML eng employee that you hire. Just talk to Jarmin like any other employee and Jarmin handles your AI/ML work from there. Completely hand over full initiatives or individual tasks.

Jarmin’s founding team is from Meta SuperIntelligence Labs (Staff Engineers), Apple (Machine Learning Engineer), AWS (scaling infra), Lockheed-Martin (Research), and JPMorganChase (SWE) with experience building AI/ML and automating complex work of Researchers, Data Scientists, ML Engineers with AI.
one_liner: 24/7 Machine Learning Engineer employees

name: Castari
long_description:
Castari lets developers deploy AI agents in secure, autoscaling sandboxes with one command. We handle tool/MCP connectors, snapshots, and observability so teams go from prototype to production in hours instead of weeks.

Developers focus on building agents, Castari provides the autoscaling sandbox infrastructure to ensure your agents and its tools are secure.
one_liner: Vercel for AI Agents – Deploy sandboxed agents with MCP tools & skills

name: Miniswap
long_description:
Miniswap a marketplace for complex hobbies, starting with Warhammer.

In hobbies as complex as Warhammer, finding what you want on general marketplaces is a huge pain. Filters don't work, free-form listings mean that products are regularly misidentified, and piles of counterfeit junk crowd search results. 

Miniswap saves hobbyists from this chaos with its catalogue of more than 20,000 unique miniatures. Sellers match their listings against Miniswap's catalogue giving buyers more information and structure as they shop.

The global market for tabletop games is estimated to be worth $20B in 2025 and Warhammer alone is projected to grow to $3B by 2030. By capturing the market in this untapped niche, Miniswap is strongly positioned to bringing greater transparency, simplicity, and connectivity into adjacent verticals.

Miniswap's founding team merges deep domain knowledge with elite programming expertise and years of experience in business consulting and startups. Co-founders Zak and Will met while studying together at Cambridge, bonded over their love of Warhammer and early modern history. They have been best friends ever since.
one_liner: The Marketplace for Complex Hobbies

name: Boom AI
long_description:
Boom builds the AI employee for e-commerce — an agent that manages every customer interaction across WhatsApp, Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, and web chat. It answers product questions, supports customers with orders, follows up on abandoned checkouts, restocks, and repeat purchases, and even runs marketing campaigns. Brands simply connect Boom to their store, and their AI agent instantly starts selling, supporting, and following up like a real team member — no setup or flow-building required.

E-commerce is a $6T market where brands spend heavily to bring customers in, only to lose over 99% of them before checkout. Boom fixes that by turning every missed conversation into a sales opportunity. Our clients increase conversion rates and deliver a concierge-like buying experience at scale. We believe that in the near future, every online store will have AI employees managing sales and customer relationships — and Boom is building the platform that makes that possible.
one_liner: AI growth team for e-commerce brands

name: Lightberry
long_description:
We build brains for robots.

We work with manufacturers like Unitree to make robots listen, speak, and act. You can program your robot out of the box by literally talking to it, no coding involved.

Robots running Lightberry are emotionally intelligent, always on, and fully autonomous. Just like in Star Wars!
one_liner: The social brain for robots.

name: Bluma
long_description:
Bluma is the first AI short form content engine.

We automate your entire consumer marketing strategy with content templates, generating on brand videos on autopilot.

Everything that a growth team would plan, script, produce, and edit, Bluma automates end-to-end and at scale.

📩 Contact us at https://www.getbluma.com/book-call to set up a call.
one_liner: The new media distribution company

name: Forge Robotics
long_description:
Forge Robotics is changing the way that metal parts are fabricated. We are enabling a future where our intelligent robotic system completes all steps needed to take raw metal stock and transform it into fully welded parts. 

Beginning with welding, we are building a robot-mounted vision system and AI feature detection that creates a real-time 3D map and tells the arm exactly where to go at every instant.
one_liner: A robotics intelligence system for metal fabrication

name: Amera
long_description:
Amera automates claims processing for health insurance payers. We turn messy claim inputs (PDFs, bills, receipts, EDI and non-standard submissions) into structured data that plugs into existing systems. This cuts manual entry and exception handling, speeding up operations and reducing cost.

We are already working with payers / plan administrators representing ~100k members, giving them access to more affordable care options.
one_liner: Automating claims processing workflows for health insurance payers.

name: DiligenceSquared
long_description:
DiligenceSquared delivers AI-powered market due diligence for investment decisions - like the $500k McKinsey reports, but automated, auditable, and at a fraction of the cost.

When Private Equity funds evaluate deals, they pay firms like McKinsey, BCG, and Bain $500K-$1M for market due diligence. The process takes weeks, and the output is a static PowerPoint that's impossible to audit. A single large-cap PE fund can spend >$30M annually on this and the total market is $10B per year.

Our AI agents conduct expert interviews and synthesize insights with every claim linked to source transcripts. No black box, no "trust me" slides, and no 10x mark-up for human labor.

Frederik bought these reports as a Principal at Blackstone. Soren sold them as a Principal at BCG. Harshil is a repeat founder and former Software Engineer at Google. We've seen both sides and know what matters in due diligence - and now we automate it.

Our clients already include 8 leading private equity funds with over $2.4 trillion in combined AUM.
one_liner: AI-powered market due diligence for investment decisions

name: LunaBill
long_description:
LunaBill is building AI Voice callers for healthcare billing teams. Insurance claim follow-up calls account for the 80% of the daily workload of a healthcare billing team, with each call averaging 30 minutes.

Since our launch in July we are now at $764K in contracted ARR, of which $428K is live revenue and the rest will go live by January 2026. Our customers see a 10x increase in claims followed up per biller in the first week and we have converted 100% of pilots to paying customers. We have automated 50,000+ calls and signed partnerships with top healthcare leaders like UC health systems, Mayo, Experian Health and more.

The founders have known each other for over a year. Suhail is a 2x founder, with 3+ years of experience building in healthcare including operating a medical billing company with 200+ healthcare clients. David founded Skiesoft, Taiwan’s biggest healthcare AI scribe company, used by 120k+ healthcare professionals. He also worked as a data scientist at UCSF, building models to audit medical-coding accuracy. Yash was a researcher at various hospital systems including Mayo Clinic.
one_liner: AI Voice callers for healthcare billing teams

name: Claybird
long_description:
Claybird makes studio-quality video ads in under 72 hours for brands like Coca-Cola, Walmart, Eight Sleep, Delve, and Mercor.

Claybird’s AI agents use single-image NeRFs, fine-tuned image editing models, and eval layers for picture-perfect, consistent results at scale.
one_liner: The full-stack AI ad company

name: Clicks
long_description:
Clicks automates your back-office using your existing tools and processes without requiring any IT integrations.

What We Do:
Think of Clicks as your back-office worker that can handle any repetitive task. Simply describe your process via video call or share documentation, and our forward-deployed engineering team ensures it's automated exactly your way.
Our AI agents work 24/7 and can be kicked-off via email, Slack, or our web app, handling tasks like CRM updates, report generation, and data entry while adapting to your existing software.

Initial Focus:
We're starting with recruiting and executive search firms, automating candidate codification, assessment reports, and administrative workflows that typically consume hours of manual work each day.

Value Proposition:
Our pricing is 100% outcome based: you only pay for the work outputs we complete (e.g., candidates added to CRM, reports generate, etc.). Current customers are already live and saving an average of 60% in costs compared to human workers, with full automation deployed within one week.
one_liner: Computer use agents to automate all back-office work

name: MarkIt
long_description:
MarkIt builds AI agents that work directly inside the workflows trade professionals use every day — Excel, PDFs, broker portals, and more. 
From defensible classification, ACE report audits, and a self-updating system of record, it serves trade professionals end to end with agents intelligent enough to work in the complex environment. 

MarkIt brings reasoning, memory, and automation to global trade compliance, helping Suppliers, Brokers, and OEMs reduce errors, save time, and streamline operations in the growingly intense world of Global Trade.
one_liner: AI Agents for Trade Compliance

name: Bear
long_description:
We help companies get recommended by AI agents, and convert that traffic into high-intent leads.

When someone asks ChatGPT, Claude, Perplexity, or any other agent for product recommendations, we make sure our customers are the ones that show up.

And when those users click through, Bear tells our customers exactly who landed on their site and which AI agent sent them, turning this into one of the highest-intent acquisition channels ever discovered.
one_liner: Market to AI Agents

name: item
long_description:
item connects to all your customer tools, gathers and enriches context automatically, and becomes your company’s source of truth — one place where your team and your AI agents share the full picture to act autonomously.

At the center is the Assistant — your sidekick for daily work. It can send follow-ups, research leads, or add deals with a simple prompt. No complex UI, drop-downs or fields, simply ask.

For repeatable work, you build Agents that you can train like new hires, simply by writing documents that describe your processes. item Agents run business processes across sales, support, and account management autonomously.
one_liner: The AI-Native CRM that works for you

name: Mayflower
long_description: Mayflower is building an AI-powered HR plug-in that automates immigration screening, eligibility checks, and compliance for global candidates. The platform parses documents, classifies visa pathways, and generates attorney-ready forms. By integrating directly with existing HR systems, Mayflower helps companies surface only compliant candidates, reduce legal risk, and streamline the international hiring process.
one_liner: AI plug-in that automates HR immigration screening and compliance

name: AVoice
long_description:
AVoice brings full visibility to the physical side of sales.

Most sales intelligence tools only track digital interactions — emails, calls, CRM entries — but the majority of global revenue is still driven by in-person visits. Reps take photos, record voice notes, send quick messages, and make on-site observations, but this information is scattered, unstructured, and rarely reaches the CRM.

AVoice automatically captures, analyzes, and structures everything that happens during a field visit. Photos, voice notes, text updates, and observations are instantly transformed into searchable insights for reps, managers, and leadership. AVoice highlights risks, opportunities, buying signals, product issues, market trends, and territory health in real time.

By turning the offline economy into usable data, AVoice gives companies the visibility they’ve always had for digital sales — now applied to the real world where deals are actually won.
one_liner: AI-Driven Sales Intelligence for the Physical Economy

name: Luel
long_description: Luel is a two-sided platform enabling companies to access fast, rights-cleared multimodal training data at scale. We connect AI teams directly with a global network of vetted contributors and off-the-shelf datasets, cutting out slow vendor processes and delivering on-spec multimodal and instruction-grounded data with full provenance. Together, we’re building a compliant, diverse, data ecosystem that the next generation of AI depends on. For more information, visit www.luel.ai or follow us on LinkedIn.
one_liner: Turning everyday words and actions into usable training data.
